title: Ekşi Elmalar
synopsis: In an eastern Turkish town, suitors knock on the door of the mayor and father of three beautiful daughters who choose to follow their own paths.

title: Behind the Curtain: Todrick Hall
synopsis: Follow singer and YouTube sensation Todrick Hall as he launches an original musical based on growing up gay in Texas and finding showbiz success.

title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer
synopsis: A surgeon's carefully curated life edges toward disaster when a troubled teenage boy with mysterious motives begins to impose himself on his family.

title: Greg Davies: You Magnificent Beast
synopsis: British comedian Greg Davies revisits terrifying dates, manscaping disasters, his father's pranks and more in a savagely funny stand-up special.

title: The Carter Effect
synopsis: Featuring eight-time NBA All-Star Vince Carter, this documentary takes an in-depth look at his impact on pop culture and the Canadian basketball scene.

title: Aadu 2
synopsis: When Shaji Pappan and his gang of goofy outlaws find themselves low on funds, they plan to once again win a hefty prize in a tug-of-war competition.

title: End Game
synopsis: Facing an inevitable outcome, terminally ill patients meet extraordinary medical practitioners seeking to change our approach to life and death.

title: Steve Martin and Martin Short: An Evening You Will Forget for the Rest of Your Life
synopsis: Longtime pals and showbiz icons Steve Martin and Martin Short share countless quips, catchy tunes and hilarious stories about their lives in comedy.

title: Survivors Guide to Prison
synopsis: Former inmates, officers and celebrities critique the U.S. prison system in this documentary packaged as a how-to handbook for the incarcerated.

title: The Redeemed and the Dominant: Fittest on Earth
synopsis: Questions about endurance, doping and overall toughness surround a group of elite athletes as they compete fiercely at the Reebok Crossfit Games.

title: Namastey London
synopsis: To her Indian parents' dismay, London-born Jasmeet 'Jazz' Malhotra longs for everything Western, including her British boyfriend. On a family trip to India, her father arranges Jazz's nuptials to Arjun Ballu Singh, who's...

title: Party Monster: Scratching the Surface
synopsis: In the probing documentary 'Party Monster,' DJ Fingablast investigates what became of his childhood hero, DJ Slizzard.

title: My Little Pony Equestria Girls: Forgotten Friendship
synopsis: School yearbook editor Sunset Shimmer has suddenly been erased from the memories of her best friends and must find out how to fix this.

title: Filosofi Kopi The Movie
synopsis: The level-headed owner of a struggling coffee shop finds his future at risk when his partner -- a talented but cocky barista -- makes a major bet.

title: Sebastian Maniscalco: Stay Hungry
synopsis: Sebastian Maniscalco brings an acerbically unique approach to peacocks on planes, life hacks, rich in-laws and life's annoyances in this comedy special.

title: The Christmas Chronicles
synopsis: After accidentally crashing Santa's sleigh, a brother and sister pull an all-nighter to save Christmas with a savvy, straight-talking St. Nick.

title: Grandmaster
synopsis: Anticipating the next move in a serial killer's grisly game, a police chief realizes that his daughter and estranged wife are the next likely victims.

title: Derren Brown: Sacrifice
synopsis: Illusionist Derren Brown concocts a psychological experiment in which he tries to manipulate an ordinary person into taking a bullet for a stranger.

title: Ronnie Coleman: The King
synopsis: Today, legendary bodybuilder Ronnie Coleman's body bears the scars of becoming the best in the world. Here, he shares what it took to reach his goals.

title: Stink!
synopsis: After noting a strange odor in his child’s pajamas, a single dad’s search for the source uncovers potentially toxic secrets of the chemical industry.

title: The Dancer
synopsis: Orphaned by a tragedy that took the lives of her parents, Srintil grows up in a poor Indonesian village aspiring to be a sacred dancer.

title: Neevevaro
synopsis: When a blind chef’s girlfriend goes missing, his unnerving search for her leads him to find there's more to her disappearance than what meets the eye.

title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
synopsis: Problems big and small pop up when Scott Lang, aka Ant-Man, gets drafted by Dr. Hank Pym and Hope van Dyne, aka the Wasp, for an urgent rescue mission.

title: The Bill Murray Stories: Life Lessons Learned From a Mythical Man
synopsis: This documentary highlights spontaneous encounters with the elusive, comedic veteran, who touches lives by simply showing up anywhere.

title: Mi Obra Maestra
synopsis: A sly art dealer tries to revive the career of his longtime pal, a surly painter, with a risky plan that tests their morals and friendship.

title: A Second Chance
synopsis: Following their storybook wedding, Popoy and Basha find married life -- and starting a business together -- more challenging than they ever imagined.

title: Can't Help Falling in Love
synopsis: Gab is eager to tie the knot with her handsome boyfriend, but there's a problem, and it's a doozy: She's already married to a total stranger.

title: Chameli
synopsis: While taking shelter from a Mumbai monsoon, an investment banker forms an unlikely connection with a naïve prostitute over the course of the night.

title: Verses of Love
synopsis: Polygamy, piety and personal principles collide for a charming and congenial young university student struggling in a four-way love triangle.

title: An Hour and a Half
synopsis: Based on the 2002 El Ayyat train accident, this drama begins 90 minutes before the explosion, following the lives of riders in the third-class cars.

title: Grass Is Greener
synopsis: It lit up jazz and hip-hop -- and ignited a war on drugs steeped in racial injustice. Experts explore America's complicated relationship with weed.

title: Anthony Jeselnik: Fire in the Maternity Ward
synopsis: Forging his own comedic boundaries, Anthony Jeselnik revels in getting away with saying things others can't in this stand-up special shot in New York.

title: Shéhérazade
synopsis: Fresh out of juvenile detention in Marseille, 17-year-old Zach falls for a young prostitute and soon faces a dire dilemma while working as a pimp.

title: Weed the People
synopsis: Buoyed by hopeful experiences with medical marijuana, physicians and parents of children with cancer call for more research of its healing potential.

title: Wanda Sykes: Not Normal
synopsis: Wanda Sykes tackles politics, reality TV, racism and the secret she'd take to the grave in this rollicking, no-holds-barred stand-up special.

title: Wazir
synopsis: Helping an amputee grandmaster settle the score for his tragic past, a grieving detective unravels a conspiracy more complicated than he imagined.

title: Kabir Singh
synopsis: An exalted but short-fused surgeon plunges into a spiral of drugs, alcohol and rage after his intense relationship with his girlfriend turbulently ends.

title: Ahista Ahista
synopsis: Stood up by her groom at the altar, a young woman finds help and healing from another man -- until her ex-fiancé returns, hoping to win her back.

title: Michelle Wolf: Joke Show
synopsis: Comedian Michelle Wolf takes on outrage culture, massages, childbirth, feminism and much more (like otters) in a stand-up special from New York City.

title: Saath Saath
synopsis: A young woman falls for her classmate’s idealistic, non-materialistic ways, but is troubled upon seeing his principles change after they marry.

title: Amit Tandon: Family Tandoncies
synopsis: From the death of romance in marriage to the injustices of modern-day parenting, Amit Tandon shares wisdom and wisecracks as a battle-scarred family guy.

title: Varane Avashyamund
synopsis: At an apartment complex, the lives of a mother, a daughter seeking an arranged marriage, a military retiree and a young man become intertwined.

title: Bheeshma
synopsis: Tired of being single, a smart-aleck meme creator has a chance to prove himself to the girl he loves when he is suddenly appointed CEO of her workplace.

title: Chelsea Peretti: One of the Greats
synopsis: 'Brooklyn Nine-Nine' star Chelsea Peretti showcases her diverse talents in this dark yet silly reimagining of the comedy special.

title: Julie and Julia
synopsis: In this heartwarming tale, Julie Powell decides to spice up her uneventful life by cooking all 524 recipes outlined in Julia Child's classic cookbook.

title: Dragons: Dawn of the Dragon Racers
synopsis: The 'How to Train Your Dragon' adventure continues when a hunt for lost sheep turns into a fierce, fun-filled competition.

title: Jim Gaffigan: Cinco
synopsis: America's king of clean comedy delivers wickedly funny jokes in his fifth hour-long special.

title: Suite Francaise
synopsis: Waiting for news of her prisoner-of-war husband, a French woman in Nazi-occupied France reluctantly falls for a German officer quartering in her home.

title: Maacher Jhol
synopsis: On his first visit to his home city of Kolkata in 13 years, a Paris-based chef is faced with a cooking challenge that will change his life forever.

title: Cloverfield
synopsis: A going-away party in Manhattan is interrupted when a mysterious monster of epic proportions launches an attack on New York City.

title: Cheech and Chong's Up in Smoke
synopsis: Cheech Marin and Tommy Chong star in this tale of two stoners in search of the perfect stash of hash who end up cruising around in a van made of pot.

title: Urvi
synopsis: After getting tricked into working at a brothel, a medical student joins forces with two of her co-workers to fight their unscrupulous exploiters.

title: One Day
synopsis: After a brief college romance, Emma and Dexter pursue separate dreams, but meet on the same day each year to compare their progress in life and love.

title: Jarhead
synopsis: Instead of combat, this film focuses on the long, lonely days spent at war, and the caustic humor soldiers employ to deal with unbearable conditions.

title: My Week with Marilyn
synopsis: While filming a movie in England, Hollywood icon Marilyn Monroe slips away with a young Brit for a week of self-discovery and frivolity.

title: Underworld
synopsis: A vampire suspects that her mortal enemies, werewolves known as Lycans, are targeting a human. As she shadows him, she finds herself falling in love.

title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
synopsis: A swingin' fashion photographer by day and a groovy British secret agent by night, superspy Austin Powers must foil the sinister schemes of Dr. Evil.

title: Fashion
synopsis: A small-town girl finally realizes her dream of becoming a famous supermodel but soon finds there's a price for her glamorous new life.

title: Naruto Shippuden The Movie: Bonds
synopsis: When strange ninjas ambush the village of Konohagakure, it's up to adolescent ninja Naruto and his long-missing pal, Sasuke, to save the planet.

title: Unfinished Song
synopsis: With his wife terminally ill, Arthur's future seems grim. But he learns to find joy in life again when he joins an unconventional church choir.

title: Luck by Chance
synopsis: When Vikram gets tapped to play the male lead in a Bollywood film, he can't believe his luck. But it may ruin his relationship with his girlfriend.

title: The Sapphires
synopsis: The spirit and vitality of 1960s soul music are at the core of this film about a real-life Australian aborigine singing group and their bumpy career.

title: Cadillac Records
synopsis: The sounds of 1950s Chicago color this drama based on the true story of a bar owner who signed several future legends to his fledgling record label.

title: A Serious Man
synopsis: In this Jewish-culture send-up, Larry Gopnik has hit a 'rough patch,' and he's looking for some help. Can a few rabbis guide him to life's answers?

title: A Most Violent Year
synopsis: Abel Morales tries to avoid corruption's easy path as he pursues the American Dream amid an increasingly violent business war in 1981 New York City.

title: The Great Hack
synopsis: Explore how a data company named Cambridge Analytica came to symbolize the dark side of social media in the wake of the 2016 U.S. presidential election.

title: Return To The 36th Chamber
synopsis: When thugs prey upon innocent factory workers, a small-time scammer trains for revenge by studying the moves of Shaolin temple monks.

title: The Water Diviner
synopsis: Years after the presumed death of his three sons in battle, a grieving farmer journeys to Turkey to find them and return them to their homeland.

title: The Gift
synopsis: Newly relocated to California, a man bumps into a former classmate who seems friendly at first, but is soon revealed to be nursing a murderous grudge.

title: Kingdom of Us
synopsis: A father's suicide sends a family of eight on a journey through childhood memories and treacherous emotional waters in this poignant documentary.

title: You Carry Me
synopsis: A soap opera producer, director and makeup artist each face wrenching family turmoil, from teen rebellion and marital infidelity to Alzheimer's.

title: King Jack
synopsis: Already coping with a bully, a mercurial older brother and summer school, 15-year-old Jack is saddled with his young cousin for an eventful weekend.

title: Dukhtar
synopsis: A young mother embarks on a desperate quest for freedom when she kidnaps her 10-year-old daughter to save her from a tribal marriage.

title: The Foreigner
synopsis: After his daughter is killed by terrorists, a sullen restaurateur seeks the identities of those responsible and travels to Ireland to take vengeance.

title: Green Room
synopsis: At the end of their low-budget tour, a punk band accepts a gig at an isolated rural club, only to discover that their hosts are neo-Nazis.

title: A Heavy Heart
synopsis: Long past his heyday, a still-virile boxer tries to reconnect with his daughter as he confronts the onset of a terminal, degenerative neural disorder.

title: The African Doctor
synopsis: Happily escaping a dictatorship, a Congolese doctor transplants his family to a small French village, where culture shock sets in for everyone.

title: Eyyvah Eyyvah
synopsis: A clarinet player who lives with his grandparents in a small village is forced to move to Istanbul, where he meets a singer enjoying sudden fame.

title: Kara Bela
synopsis: The uneventful life of middle-aged Kudret turns upside down when a road trip turns into a wild race for survival with killers in hot pursuit.

title: Swiss Army Man
synopsis: A washed-up corpse with surprising abilities gives a hopeless man stranded in the wilderness someone to talk to -- and a newfound reason to live.

title: American Honey
synopsis: A teenage girl leaves her dull life in Oklahoma to join a raucous band of travelling magazine sellers on an alcohol-, drug- and sex-filled road trip.

title: Prelude to War
synopsis: Frank Capra's documentary chronicles the rise of authoritarianism in Germany, Italy and Japan as America prepares for a defense of liberty.

title: Lens
synopsis: Addicted to webcams and voyeurism, a married man gets more than he bargained for when an online stranger tries to force him to watch a suicide.

title: S Is for Stanley
synopsis: This film examines the complex life of iconic filmmaker Stanley Kubrick, as seen through the eyes of his devoted longtime driver, Emilio D'Alessandro.

title: Boyka: Undisputed
synopsis: The fourth film in the action franchise finds Boyka taking on brutal gangsters to protect the widow of a man he unintentionally killed in the ring.

title: Resurface
synopsis: A suicidal war veteran finds like-minded souls in a surf therapy program that helps traumatized soldiers heal while riding the waves.

title: Jerry Before Seinfeld
synopsis: Jerry Seinfeld returns to the club that gave him his start in the 1970s, mixing iconic jokes with stories from his childhood and early days in comedy.

title: Gaga: Five Foot Two
synopsis: Follow pop provocateur Lady Gaga as she releases a new album, preps for her Super Bowl halftime show, and confronts physical and emotional struggles.

title: Dhobi Ghat (Mumbai Diaries)
synopsis: In this intimate drama, circumstances draw together four people from different castes -- which would normally preclude them from forming friendships.

title: National Parks Adventure
synopsis: Narrated by Robert Redford, this documentary tours the awe-inspiring landscapes, historic sites and untamed wilderness of America's great parks.

title: Ram Dass, Going Home
synopsis: From his home on Maui, pioneering researcher, author and spiritual teacher Ram Dass reflects on love, life and death as his own days draw to a close.

title: Main Hoon Na
synopsis: Major Ram Prasad Sharma yearns to see project Mission Milaap come to fruition and usher in an era of peace between two warring countries. But the evil Raghavan will do anything to stop the peace process.

title: Ajji
synopsis: When her small granddaughter is sexually assaulted by a powerful man and no justice is served, a poor, frail old woman plots her violent revenge.

title: Legendary Weapons of China
synopsis: Three assassins -- magician Lei Ying, hit man Tieh Hon and kung fu master Ti Tan -- are sent to Yunnan by their clan leader to bring to justice another clan member who betrayed the tribe.

title: Painted Faces
synopsis: In this dramatized rendition, students undergo rigorous study at Master Yu's Peking Opera school, a cradle for future Hong Kong film stars.

title: Melvin Goes to Dinner
synopsis: When Melvin and his friends gather for dinner, their casual conversation takes a sharp turn as they begin to disclose raw truths about themselves.

title: Dance Academy: The Comeback
synopsis: In this adaptation of the TV series, Tara recovers from injury and pursues a career in the U.S., where she grapples with love and professional rejection.

title: Qarib Qarib Singlle
synopsis: After reluctantly joining a dating app, a 35-year-old widow accompanies an easygoing poet on a trip to visit three of his exes.

title: Katt Williams: Live
synopsis: Outspoken comedian Katt Williams pokes fun at a variety of topics, including sex, relationships, parenthood and trying to make it as an entertainer.

title: Den of Thieves
synopsis: A highly skilled crew of bank robbers plotting a heist at the supposedly impenetrable Federal Reserve faces off against an elite unit of L.A. cops.
